title: No CSRF validation on Account Monitors in Synthetics Block
vulnerability_information:
Hello,
There is no CSRF token validation on DELETING "monitor" which we create in synthetics section.

DELETE /accounts/1338635/monitors/de70ee8d-2fa0-416c-8592-47ebde01aa7e.json HTTP/1.1
Host: synthetics.newrelic.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; rv:45.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/45.0
Accept: application/json, text/plain, */*
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Referer: https://synthetics.newrelic.com/accounts/1338635/monitors/de70ee8d-2fa0-416c-8592-47ebde01aa7e/edit
Cookie: NRREFL=https://hackerone.com/newrelic; NRREFP=https://hackerone.com/newrelic; optimizelyEndUserId=oeu1457986550335r0.6000279262459117; optimizelySegments={"171941824":"ff","172184284":"false","172242367":"referral","1025373943":"none","1227391094":"Enterprise"}; optimizelyBuckets={}; utag_main=_st:1463912386362$v_id:015376ea7205000abb42db64f25c07048003b00d00978$_sn:3$_ss:0$_pn:28;exp-session$ses_id:1463907761555;exp-session; __ar_v4=DLQZ5QQWIFBZZM5ECJME6X:20160521:2|7QCUSMLEMBHIPPEMTU6A7A:20160521:4|I7ZJI4CQMBCNHGOQ27AYQZ:20160521:6|YCNZVXZ6TJDJ3KMJRVGKFH:20160521:6; _ceg.s=o7ko2m; _ceg.u=o7ko2m; ei_client_id=5741766fa8d65d1100f32f83; hit_signup_confirmation=1; _ga=GA1.2.1405693252.1457986715; _mkto_trk=id:412-MZS-894&token:_mch-newrelic.com-1457986717455-48008; __qca=P0-1982536586-1457989097502; _biz_uid=2c9f1e971b2d4305b0675ec2c71e8b36; _biz_nA=4; _biz_pendingA=[]; ajs_user_id=null; ajs_group_id=null; ajs_anonymous_id="795e29e1-6f05-4413-859f-fe3bd77f88c1"; login_service_login_newrelic_com_tokens={"token":"","refresh_token":""}; _biz_flagsA={"Version":1,"Mkto":"1"}; mindsparktb_222250168=true; mindsparktbsupport_222250168=true; mindspark_extension_api_features_222250168=TOOLBAR_CLEANER; mindsparktb_222250168=true; mindsparktbsupport_222250168=true; mindspark_extension_api_features_222250168=TOOLBAR_CLEANER; nr_zd_logged_in=true; last_seen=1463908342940; _gat_ga33=1

vulnerability_information_html:
Hello,
There is no CSRF token validation on DELETING "monitor" which we create in synthetics section.

DELETE /accounts/1338635/monitors/de70ee8d-2fa0-416c-8592-47ebde01aa7e.json HTTP/1.1
Host: synthetics.newrelic.com

activities.message:
Hi Daniyal,

Thank you for the report! I've reproduced the issue and have reported it to the owning engineering team for remediation. We'll report back on this ticket once the issue has been resolved for you to verify.

Cheers,
Matthew

We cannot comment on timelines for fixes to be deployed. The work has been entered into the teams work queue and it being prioritized against other work based on severity of the issue.

Thank you,
Matthew
